open.author.name: Marek Marecki
message:
Rename constructor instructions

There is a group of instructions that create "new" values.
I call them the "construction instructions"; e.g. "strstore", "istore",
"bits".

Their naming is not consistent (as a result of the ISA being grown, rather
than designed) and should be changed. The following changes are needed:

- "strstore" -> "string"
- "istore" -> "integer"
- "fstore" -> "float"
- "vec" -> "vector"
project.name: Viua Virtual Machine
close.author.name: Marek Marecki
